void UsbObexTransport::ResolveClientAddr (  const String &  client_url,
ObexProtocolId  prot_id,
ObexOperationId  job_id
)  [virtual]
 

Resolves an OBEX client address URL.

This is a factory method which evaluates the URL given in string format and creates an address information object which may contain specific information for the transport. This is accomplished by deriving a subclass from ObexClientAddr and creating an address information object from this class. Then a smartpointer of type ObexAddrPtr to this object and the job_id which was supplied with the URL must be returned by calling ReturnObexAddress().

Parameters:
remote_url Remote address in URL format - the URL the client is going to connect to.
prot_id Protocol which will be bound to the address
job_id Reference to associate request and response

Implements ObexAbstractTransport.
